description:
Results-oriented and client-focused, Hood Law Firm, LLC, handles a range of civil litigation matters. Based in Charleston, South Carolina, we take cases throughout the state as well as across the country. The attorneys at our practice combine decades of experience in cases that include commercial litigation, construction matters, maritime law, employment and sexual discrimination, environmental law, civil rights, negligence, health care law and transportation law.

For more than 30 years, our law firm has been committed to pursuing justice to the fullest extent for our clients. Our attorneys have appeared before state and federal courts, including taking cases to the Supreme Court of the United States.

The benefits of working with us include the following:

  • Awards such as being published in The Best Lawyers in America
  • More than 20 attorneys who work as a team to give clients the best possible representation
  • Experience in both plaintiff and defense cases

We develop customized strategies for each person we represent. Hood Law Firm, LLC, has an extensive successful track record, both in courtroom victories and negotiated settlements. Our team has worked with Fortune 500 companies, individuals, financial institutions, insurance companies, small startups and multinational corporations. No matter what the details or complexities of a case may be, we have the knowledge, resources and resolve to handle it.
